sentences.en: A 15 - minute dose of red light can double the previous respiration rate of the plants.
sentences.cn: 照射15分钟红光可使植物原来的呼吸速率提高一倍.

sentences.en: Anaerobic respiration occurs only in particularly active tissues such as muscles during severe exercise.
sentences.cn: 厌氧呼吸只有在处于剧烈运动状态的肌肉等特别活跃的组织中才会发生。

sentences.en: Blood pressure and respiration are also recorded.
sentences.cn: 血压和呼吸也做了记录。

sentences.en: His respiration grew fainter throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 一天当中，他的呼吸越来越微弱。

sentences.en: I tried to gauge the depth of her sleep by the rate of her respiration.
sentences.cn: 我试图通过她的呼吸速率来测定她的睡眠深度.

sentences.en: Intubation and assisted respiration will be required.
Rescuers pulled the child from the river, and she was given artificial respiration.
sentences.cn: 抢救者把孩子从河里救上来, 给她做人工呼吸.

sentences.en: Respiration becomes difficult at great heights.
sentences.cn: 在很高的地方呼吸就变得很难.

sentences.en: She was given artificial respiration and cardiac massage.
sentences.cn: 有人给她做了人工呼吸和心脏按压。

sentences.en: The process of respiration involves two major processes: inspiration and expiration.
sentences.cn: 呼吸的过程包含了两个主要的阶段: 吸气和吐气.

sentences.en: The term " respiration " is more than breathing.
sentences.cn: 呼吸作用这名词不仅指呼吸而已.

sentences.en: They made frequent checks on his respiration, pulse and blood.
sentences.cn: 他们经常检查他的呼吸 、 脉搏和血液.

sentences.en: They tried artificial respiration but it was of no avail.
sentences.cn: 他们试做人工呼吸,可是无效.

sentences.en: This has been termed the'respiration climacteric '.
Whatever method of heating was used, artificial respiration was essential for reanimation.
sentences.cn: 无论用任何暖和方法, 人工呼吸仍是救生所必需的.

words.tran_cn: 口罩；[医] 呼吸器；防毒面具

phrases.tran_cn: 人工呼吸；人工呼吸急救法

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸，一次呼吸，（植物的）呼吸，一息
